fields.name: *A man dressed in an obscenely expensive suit smiles coldly at you. Although his expression is frigid, you can clearly see something else behind his eyes:
fields.value:
a never-ending oil well continually pumps up murky liquid, feeding the burning furnace inside his heart.*
Defense: Basic

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- During the day, choose a player to Convict. At night, open a chat with that player anonymously. They can't do actions that night and are given powerful defense (acts same as jail). Visits against them fail.
- At night, the Convicted player must claim they are one role to you. They can lie.
- At night, choose to judge your Convicted player: guess whether they are telling the truth or are lying to you. If you guess correctly, you execute them.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You are killed by Neutral-Killing players you Convict if you fail to execute them. They deal a powerful attack to you.
- If a player doesn't claim, you execute them. This counts towards your destiny.

fields.name: Destiny:
fields.value: Judge 3 players correctly and execute them.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Have each living Peasant fulfill their Destiny.
